org.apache.flink.api.java.io.jdbc

类 JDBCInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.RichInputFormat<Row,InputSplit>
      • org.apache.flink.api.java.io.jdbc.JDBCInputFormat
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, InputFormat<Row,InputSplit>, ResultTypeQueryable<Row>, InputSplitSource<InputSplit>

    public class JDBCInputFormat
extends RichInputFormat<Row,InputSplit>
implements ResultTypeQueryable<Row>
    InputFormat to read data from a database and generate Rows. The InputFormat has to be configured using the supplied InputFormatBuilder. A valid RowTypeInfo must be properly configured in the builder, e.g.: 
    
 TypeInformation[] fieldTypes = new TypeInformation[] {
                BasicTypeInfo.INT_TYPE_INFO,
                BasicTypeInfo.STRING_TYPE_INFO,
                BasicTypeInfo.STRING_TYPE_INFO,
                BasicTypeInfo.DOUBLE_TYPE_INFO,
                BasicTypeInfo.INT_TYPE_INFO
        };

 RowTypeInfo rowTypeInfo = new RowTypeInfo(fieldTypes);

 JDBCInputFormat jdbcInputFormat = JDBCInputFormat.buildJDBCInputFormat()
                                .setDrivername("org.apache.derby.jdbc.EmbeddedDriver")
                                .setDBUrl("jdbc:derby:memory:ebookshop")
                                .setQuery("select * from books")
                                .setRowTypeInfo(rowTypeInfo)
                                .finish();

    In order to query the JDBC source in parallel, you need to provide a parameterized query template (i.e. a valid PreparedStatement) and a ParameterValuesProvider which provides binding values for the query parameters. E.g.: 

    

 Serializable[][] queryParameters = new String[2][1];
 queryParameters[0] = new String[]{"Kumar"};
 queryParameters[1] = new String[]{"Tan Ah Teck"};

 JDBCInputFormat jdbcInputFormat = JDBCInputFormat.buildJDBCInputFormat()
                                .setDrivername("org.apache.derby.jdbc.EmbeddedDriver")
                                .setDBUrl("jdbc:derby:memory:ebookshop")
                                .setQuery("select * from books WHERE author = ?")
                                .setRowTypeInfo(rowTypeInfo)
                                .setParametersProvider(new GenericParameterValuesProvider(queryParameters))
                                .finish();
    另请参阅:
    Row, ParameterValuesProvider, PreparedStatement, DriverManager, 序列化表格

      • getProducedType

        public RowTypeInfo getProducedType()
        从接口复制的说明: ResultTypeQueryable
        Gets the data type (as a TypeInformation) produced by this function or input format.
        指定者:
        getProducedType 在接口中 ResultTypeQueryable<Row>
        返回:
        The data type produced by this function or input format.

      • configure

        public void configure(Configuration parameters)
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Configures this input format. Since input formats are instantiated generically and hence parameterless, this method is the place where the input formats set their basic fields based on configuration values.

        This method is always called first on a newly instantiated input format.

        指定者:
        configure 在接口中 InputFormat<Row,InputSplit>
        参数:
        parameters - The configuration with all parameters (note: not the Flink config but the TaskConfig).

      • openInputFormat

        public void openInputFormat()
        从类复制的说明: RichInputFormat
        Opens this InputFormat instance. This method is called once per parallel instance. Resources should be allocated in this method. (e.g. database connections, cache, etc.)
        覆盖:
        openInputFormat 在类中 RichInputFormat<Row,InputSplit>
        另请参阅:
        InputFormat

      • closeInputFormat

        public void closeInputFormat()
        从类复制的说明: RichInputFormat
        Closes this InputFormat instance. This method is called once per parallel instance. Resources allocated during RichInputFormat.openInputFormat() should be closed in this method.
        覆盖:
        closeInputFormat 在类中 RichInputFormat<Row,InputSplit>
        另请参阅:
        InputFormat

      • open

        public void open(InputSplit inputSplit)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Connects to the source database and executes the query in a parallel fashion if this InputFormat is built using a parameterized query (i.e. using a PreparedStatement) and a proper ParameterValuesProvider, in a non-parallel fashion otherwise.
        指定者:
        open 在接口中 InputFormat<Row,InputSplit>
        参数:
        inputSplit - which is ignored if this InputFormat is executed as a non-parallel source, a "hook" to the query parameters otherwise (using its splitNumber)
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if there's an error during the execution of the query

        指定者:

      • getStatistics

        public BaseStatistics getStatistics(BaseStatistics cachedStatistics)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Gets the basic statistics from the input described by this format. If the input format does not know how to create those statistics, it may return null. This method optionally gets a cached version of the statistics. The input format may examine them and decide whether it directly returns them without spending effort to re-gather the statistics.

        When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be configured.

        指定者:
        getStatistics 在接口中 InputFormat<Row,InputSplit>
        参数:
        cachedStatistics - The statistics that were cached. May be null.
        返回:
        The base statistics for the input, or null, if not available.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • createInputSplits

        public InputSplit[] createInputSplits(int minNumSplits)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: InputFormat
        Creates the different splits of the input that can be processed in parallel.

        When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be configured.

        指定者:
        createInputSplits 在接口中 InputFormat<Row,InputSplit>
        指定者:
        createInputSplits 在接口中 InputSplitSource<InputSplit>
        参数:
        minNumSplits - The minimum desired number of splits. If fewer are created, some parallel instances may remain idle.
        返回:
        The splits of this input that can be processed in parallel.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, when the creation of the splits was erroneous.
